page.title: 05SHOPS IN PARWICH
page.content: {The Shop}- There is only one shop in the village and Mrs. Birds and Mrs. Spencer serve in the shop. It is one of the few brick-built buildings in the village although an extension at the back has been made of stone to fit in with the Peak National Park regulations. There is a fierce dog at the back to guard it. The shop sells food, sweets, wine, newspapers, cards, toys and anything you might run out of. { {The Post Office}- This is in Mrs. McCormick's house and she also sells sweets, stationery, needles, pins and threads. { {Mobile shops}- Once a week George Peach's butcher's van comes to the village from Ashbourne. A greengrocer's van comes too.
